amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, And Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.catchline: Community College Aid Fund; created; use; investment.
amendatorysection.para: The Community College Aid Fund is created. The fund shall be used to provide state aid to community college areas pursuant to the Community College Aid Act. Any money in the fund available for investment shall be invested by the state investment officer pursuant to the Nebraska Capital Expansion Act and the Nebraska State Funds Investment Act.

crossreference.para: Nebraska Capital Expansion Act, see section 72-1269.
Nebraska State Funds Investment Act, see section 72-1260.
